welcomeOffer.description: Earn 60,000 Membership Rewards® points after spending $6,000 on eligible purchases in the first 6 months of Card Membership

earnRates.regularSpending: 2X points on travel, gas, groceries, and drugstores in Canada; 1X points on other purchases

mainBenefits: 4 complimentary Plaza Premium Lounge visits annually
$50 NEXUS application fee credit every 4 years
Metal card design (Gold or Rose Gold)
